This css grid design was inspired by Jen Simmons' video titled "CSS Grid like you are Jan Tschichold." I am a huge fan of Jen's work, and this was a great project to practice working with CSS grid.

See the Pen CSS Grid Tschichold Quote by Alyson Sherrard (@ux_unicorn) on CodePen.
